column2: "Ah, Guardian. As you can see, we have arrived at something of a sticking-point. Ms. Hitsugi can tell you more."
"As a child, I took my summer vacations with my brother in the royal summer resort."

"This is my first time enjoying summer with so many people around...
I must confess, I am somewhat lost."
"This me... this Harriet... is a temporary being that will last only until the close of summer. Somehow, I feel at peace with that."
"There is nothing to be gained from worrying about it. My only concern is to enjoy summer with everybody."

"This play equipment, down from which water cascades ceaselessly...
I am told it is a \"water slide\"."
"It is a most interesting way to cool oneself. You might not think me the type, but I would rather like to try it."
"Whenever you wish to use that Relief Ticket, you have only to let me know."
"Do not save it overlong like my brother, lest it be wasted. Use it as soon as a reason presents itself."
